name: MHR-Banner [Show banner/advertisement on page footer]
author: Mahadir Ahmad

sections.description:
Floating footer banner

Publish your banner/advertisement in unique way, on page footer.Support all images format including bmp,jpeg,
jpg,png,gif,etc.

visit plugin site: http://www.mahadirlab.com/en/mhr-banner

Please note

  • After activating this plugin please go to Settings menu and select enable MHR-Banner to enable it.
  • For Banner URL you must use full address with ‘http://’.
  • Make sure your banner width setting did not exceed your width screen.

Did you like it?

Did it help? If you like this plugin and find it useful, please consider donating

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire folder of MHR-Banner to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings and then MHR-Banner to configure and enable.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial version

2.0

*Add color picker box
*Add cookie configuration
